channel.title: CVE Feed for Skyhigh -- Skyhigh Client Proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Skyhigh -- Skyhigh Client Proxy

item.title: CVE-2024-0313|2024-08-02T19:28:22.007Z -- skyhigh -- skyhigh%20client%20proxy
item.description: A malicious insider exploiting this vulnerability can circumvent existing security controls put in place by the organization. On the contrary, if the victim is legitimately using the temporary bypass to reach out to the Internet for retrieving application and system updates, a remote device could target it and undo the bypass, thereby denying the victim access to the update service, causing it to fail.

item.title: CVE-2024-0311|2024-06-04T17:59:07.128Z -- skyhigh -- skyhigh%20client%20proxy
item.description: A malicious insider can bypass the existing policy of Skyhigh Client Proxy without a valid release code.

item.title: CVE-2024-0312|2024-06-04T17:58:32.706Z -- skyhigh -- skyhigh%20client%20proxy
item.description: A malicious insider can uninstall Skyhigh Client Proxy without a valid uninstall password.
